org.jclouds.abiquo.features
Interface EnterpriseApi

public interface EnterpriseApi

Provides synchronous access to Abiquo Enterprise API.

Author:
Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat
See Also:
http://community.abiquo.com/display/ABI20/API+Reference, EnterpriseAsyncApi

createLimits

com.abiquo.server.core.enterprise.DatacenterLimitsDto createLimits(com.abiquo.server.core.enterprise.EnterpriseDto enterprise,
                                                                   com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.DatacenterDto datacenter,
                                                                   com.abiquo.server.core.enterprise.DatacenterLimitsDto limits)
Allows the given enterprise to use the given datacenter with the given limits.

Parameters:
enterprise - The enterprise.
datacenter - The datacenter to allow to the given enterprise.
limits - The usage limits for the enterprise in the given datacenter.
Returns:
The usage limits for the enterprise in the given datacenter.

refreshTemplateRepository

void refreshTemplateRepository(Integer enterpriseId,
                               Integer datacenterRepositoryId)
Refreshes database with virtual machine templates existing in the repository filesystem.

Parameters:
enterpriseId - Id of the enterprise which information will be refreshed.
datacenterRepositoryId - Id of the datacenter repository contaning the templates.
